org.daisy.dotify.common.split

Interface SplitPointDataSource<T extends SplitPointUnit>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of split point units
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SplitPointDataList

    public interface SplitPointDataSource<T extends SplitPointUnit>
    Provides split point data source. Data provided by via this interface is expected to be immutable. The interface is designed to work with data sources of unknown size. Access to the interfaces methods should be done with care to limit unnecessary computation in the data source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      Gets the item at index.

      int getSize(int limit)
      Gets the size of the manager or the limit if the number of items is greater than the limit
      Supplements<T> getSupplements()
      Gets the split point data source supplements.

      Returns true if the manager has an element at the specified index

        Gets the item at index.

        Returns:

        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is beyond the end of the stream

      • head

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<T> head(int toIndex)
        Deprecated. use split(int)
        Gets the items before index.
        Parameters:
        toIndex - the index, exclusive
        Returns:
        returns a head list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is beyond the end of the stream

      • getRemaining

        java.util.List<T> getRemaining()
        Gets all remaining items. Note that using this method will result in all elements being computed, if this is not what is needed. Consider using head(int) instead.
        Returns:
        returns all remaining items

      • tail

        @Deprecated
SplitPointDataSource<T> tail(int fromIndex)
        Deprecated. use split(int)
        Gets a tail list.
        Parameters:
        fromIndex - the starting index, inclusive
        Returns:
        returns a new split point data source starting from fromIndex
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is beyond the end of the stream

      • split

        SplitResult<T> split(int atIndex)
        Gets the result of splitting at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        atIndex - the index where the tail starts
        Returns:
        returns a split result at the specified index

      • hasElementAt

        boolean hasElementAt(int index)
        Returns true if the manager has an element at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        Returns:
        returns true if the manager has an element at the specified index, false otherwise

      • getSize

        int getSize(int limit)
        Gets the size of the manager or the limit if the number of items is greater than the limit
        Parameters:
        limit - the limit
        Returns:
        returns the size, or the limit

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the manager contains no items. Note that this method can returns true, even if getSupplements() is non-empty.
        Returns:
        returns true if the manager has no items, false otherwise

      • getSupplements

        Supplements<T> getSupplements()
        Gets the split point data source supplements.
        Returns:
        the supplements
